Kerygma Ministry

For the KINGDOM OF GOD depends not on mere talk but power 1 Cor. 4:20

Mission Statement

Kerygma Ministry is a lay Catholic ministry of Jude And Veronica Antoine in proclaiming the love of God to the world.
It aims to disciple, train, equip and mobilize lay Catholics to live and share this same love with others.
By infecting and affecting others for Christ, Kerygma seeks to participate in the evangelizing mission of the Catholic Church - the Mission "Ad Gentes" and "Intra Gentes".

Kerygma

(Kih rihg' muh) Transliteration of the Greek term, which means both the act of preaching and the content of the preaching.
It is primarily the act of proclaiming the acts of God more than the ability to speak in beautiful or eloquent words.
It is persuasive because it is done in the Spirit and with power (1 Cor. 2:4 and 1 Cor 4:20 )

3 Priorities

  1. Renewal of the Catholic church - Theology of Encounter – leading Catholics to a personal relationship with Jesus Christ and transformation of life through the grace and power of the Holy Spirit.
  2. Mission and Evangelization – in the training, formation and mobilization of Catholic laity – singles and families into missions – locally and across the world.
  3. Pastoral formation - lay, religious & clergy.
